skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Junior front-end developer with a strong grasp of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, dedicated to crafting engaging and intuitive web interfaces. Eager to learn, collaborate, and contribute to creating seamless user experiences through modern technologies and design principles.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Aspiring junior back-end developer with a foundation in server-side technologies and database management. Committed to building efficient and secure web applications, and eager to expand skills in creating robust back-end solutions that power seamless user experiences.

skills.title: Full-Stack
skills.description: Emerging junior full stack developer with a passion for creating end-to-end web solutions. Proficient in both front-end technologies, as well as back-end technologies such as server-side scripting and database management, dedicated to delivering comprehensive and user-focused digital experiences.

skills.title: Web-Research
skills.description: Skilled in web research techniques, assimilating relevant information to support informed decision-making and problem-solving. Utilizes research skills to stay updated on emerging trends and technologies, contributing to the continuous improvement of web development practices.

portfolio.title: Static Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Designed a static portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase my projects and skills. Implemented clean and responsive design principles, offering visitors an engaging and informative experience that reflects my expertise and creativity.

portfolio.title: Simple E-commerce website
portfolio.description: Created a basic e-commerce website mimic using HTML and CSS, featuring product display with images, names, and prices. Demonstrated design and layout skills in presenting products and their details within a simplified online shopping environment.

portfolio.title: Simple E-commerce website with auth
portfolio.description: A basic e-commerce website mimic with user authentication using React. Leveraged React components and state management to create secure registration, login, highlighting skills in building interactive and authenticated web experiences.
